Package gamecomponents.people

Class Player

java.lang.Object
display.GameComponent
gamecomponents.people.Person
gamecomponents.people.Player
public class Player
extends Person
The Player class is a Person that is controlled by the user.
Author:
EmilyTumacder

    • Player

      public Player​(Location loc, boolean isInfected, char direction, char mode)
      Creates a Player with given information
      Parameters:
      loc - Location at which the Player starts at
      isInfected - whether the Player starts out infected or not
      direction - which direction the Player will start moving in
      mode - the mode of the Player

      Parameters:

    • getInventory

      public int[] getInventory()
      Returns:

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove​(Location loc, Tier t)
      Checks whether the Player can move. The Player is able to do a multitude of things if intersecting with certain GameComponent including: -(Person) pick up the person -(Hospital) drop person off at hospital -(Vaccine clinic) drop person off at clinic -(Public Place) drop a specialist off to convert it into a Hospital or Vaccine clinic
      Parameters:
      t - Tier in which the Player is inside
      loc - the location to check for
      Returns:
      whether or not the Player can move

      Description copied from class: Person
      Makes the Person infected
      Overrides:
      contractVirus in class Person

    • getYourPerson

      public Person getYourPerson()
      Get the person in your inventory
      Returns:
      yourPerson
